title: Jane Seton: or, the Kings Advocate. A Scottish historical romance
author: Grant, James
snippet: Confused and terrified by a scene so unusual, Janemurmured she knew not what, as her thanks and adieuxto Sh John Forrester, and gave her hand to thegovernor, who led her within the archway, on thebattlements of which was seen the head of the Masterof Forbes, who a short time before had been beheadedfor raising a sedition in the Scottish camp at Fala, andattempting to shoot king James with an arquebuse.
